original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 328.50/329.50 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka rupee opened at 328.50/329.50 in the spot market, dealers said while bond yields closed lower.
The rupee closed at 328.00/329.00 to the US dollar in the spot market Thursday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted at 13.90/14.10 percent down from Friday’s closed at 14.15/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 was quoted at 14.20/25 percent down from closing at 14.40/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 14.75/85 percent down from closing at 14.95/15.05 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 14.95/15.05 percent down from closing at 15.15/20 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted at 15.30/50 percent down from closing at 15.60/80 percent. (Colombo/July28/2023)
